name: The Big Cheese
description:
The Big Cheese

A fast paced online multiplayer shooter set on the moon.

Collect cheese as you dig and destroy the moon. Who will have the most cheese in the end? Who will come out victorious?

Aim

Dig the cheesy moon and collect as much cheese as possible until the round ends. Other players will be doing the same.
Shooting other players will make them drop their cheese. The round ends when there is no more moon left!

Cheese Cheese Type Description Regular Cheese 1 Point Green Cheese Halves your score Spinning Cheese Double your score Power ups Power Up Type Description Double Gun Shoot two bullets at once Bomb Trigger a blast, destroying a large portion of the moon Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

Mouse and Left Click for shooting/digging

More Info

Suggestions on features to add or improve? A bug to report? Raise a ticket here: https://github.com/Game-Off-2020/the-big-cheese/issues

This project can also be played on GitHub Pages:

https://game-off-2020.github.io/the-big-cheese/
